material.mattext: Are the conditions which allow us to safely use the z-test met? Support your answer with appropriate graphs, if needed.

There are two conditions we need to check: (i) The sample is random. (ii) That the Central Limit Theorem has been satisfied. (i) Since the data was collected by the EPA (a federal government agency) we can be assured that good statistical sampling was done. (ii) Here is the histogram of the data. Although it is somewhat skewed to the left, the sample size is 71, which is more than 30. So, it does not matter...
